info.name: Unofficial - Chatbox addon for Comfort Dark Red
info.description: This theme styles YouTube's chat box feature to blend in with Comfort Dark Red by Decu.
info.additionalInfo:
NOTE: This has been upstreamed into Decu's main template. If you use Comfort Dark Red, you no longer need this. Leaving it up for people who are mixing and matching with other styles.

Comfort Dark Red Theme: https://userstyles.org/styles/113534/youtube-comfort-dark-red
